name: Nalin Jyothy
description: Python project that analyses tweets using NLP

name: Sandra Gilson
description: The Animal Hangman Adventure is an engaging and educational word-guessing game built using Python.In this game, players attempt to guess the letters of a hidden word, which is randomly selected from a list of animal names. The objective is to guess the word correctly before running out of attempts, represented by the stages of a hangman being drawn.

name: Rithika Harikrishna
description: The Wumpus World is a grid-based AI game where an agent navigates a cave to find gold while avoiding the Wumpus (a monster) and deadly pits. The agent uses percepts like breeze (near pits) and stench (near Wumpus) to make decisions. It demonstrates basic AI reasoning and decision-making.

name: Fabena Franklin
description: This is a project to implement traffic light using java gui

name: Fabitha Franklin
description: It is a python program highly useful for improving typing skills for beginners

name: Siddharth Nair
description: A simple Python weather app that fetches real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. It features a user-friendly Tkinter GUI, displaying temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions for any city. Easy to set up and run, perfect for beginners learning API integration and GUI development.

name: Sanal Sajan E
description: This project is a Text Summarization Tool built using Gradio and a pre-trained LLM. It allows users to input long text and generate concise summaries with adjustable length parameters. The interface provides real-time processing feedback and an easy-to-use UI for efficient text summarization.

name: Sree Hari A
description: A simple web app that converts text for different audience, like for a 5-year-old, Gen Z, and more.

name: Alan.s.robin
description: This project develops an AI-powered health assistant to improve healthcare access and efficiency.  Using machine learning and NLP, it provides personalized health information, streamlines administrative tasks, and enables remote monitoring.  The system integrates a user interface, AI core, and diverse data sources.  Future work focuses on enhanced personalization, accuracy, and functionality.  The goal is a user-friendly tool for patients and providers, contributing to a more effective healthcare system.

description: this project is about a snake game that is enjoyable
